mapper.sql: id, room_id, sender_id, content, message_type, recalled, timestamp, chat_type, receiver_id, create_time, update_time, is_deleted
mapper.select: SELECT id, sender_id AS senderId, receiver_id AS receiverId, content, message_type AS messageType, chat_type AS chatType, timestamp, create_time FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND recalled = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM chat_message WHERE room_id = #{roomId} AND is_deleted = 0 AND recalled = 0 ORDER BY create_time DESC

SELECT
FROM chat_message m JOIN ( SELECT room_id, MAX(create_time) AS max_time FROM chat_message WHERE room_id IN (${roomIds}) GROUP BY room_id ) latest ON m.room_id = latest.room_id AND m.create_time = latest.max_time
